name: undrained
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
without the liquid having been removed or allowed to flow away: Well into modern times the major wetlands of England remained undrained. When the vegetables and the rice are tender, stir in the turkey and undrained tomatoes.
More examplesFewer examplesWhile the cake bakes, boil the undrained pineapple until syrupy.The original undrained wetlands would have slowed the passage of water into the main system in times of unusually high rainfall.There are no trees which will thrive if planted in an undrained bog.
